  • Method Details

    • breakTie

      protected Candidate breakTie​(Candidate candidate1, Candidate candidate2)
      Breaks a tie between two candidates by using a random number generator to simulate flipping a coin 99 times. This way, there will always be a winner, as the odd number of tosses removes the possibility of ties.
      Parameters:
      candidate1 -
      candidate2 -
      Returns:
      Either candidate1 or candidate2 based on the results of flipping a simulated coin 99 times.
